description: The classic topcoat gets a Ralph Lauren refresh with our Polo Soft fit, which is defined by a natural shoulder and a half-canvassed construction. This version is tailored from a double-faced wool blend that was sourced from an Italian mill and features a plaid interior.
fitting_details: Size 40R has a 38½" front body length, a 38" back body length, an 18¾" shoulder, and a 19¼" sleeve inseam.
Notch lapels. Buttonhole at the left lapel. Three-button placket.
Left chest welt pocket. Two front waist flapped pockets. Two interior chest pockets.
Shell: wool, nylon, viscose, polyester, acrylic. Body lining: polyester. Sleeve lining: viscose, acetate.
Model is 6'1"/185 cm and wears a size 40R.
